resources.string:
Tap on the correct answer from the four choices on each question and tap on submit to submit your answer.
\n\nTry to get as much correct answers as you can!
Here we have some reading exercises! Try to read each word without guides and tap on the word to reveal its Romanized version. Goodluck!

This application is made possible through the combined efforts of four university students from Univesidad De Manila.


Development started on November 1, 2022 and the first Beta version was released on November 27, 2022.


The application was made under the guidance of CET Faculty member Mr. Ronald Fernandez and Korean language expert Mr. John Park of South Korea.
